articles.author: David J. Eicher
articles.title: Catch Saturday's lunar eclipse: This Week in Astronomy with Dave Eicher | Astronomy.com - Astronomy Magazine
articles.description: Europe, Asia, and Africa have the best view of this partial lunar eclipse, while the northeastern U.S. sees the final, penumbral stages.
articles.content:
In this special early edition of This Week in Astronomy, we look ahead to this weekends partial lunar eclipse.
In a partial lunar eclipse, the deepest part of the Earths shadow the umbra only partia… [+1357 chars]
